channel.title: Yemen on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Yemen on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.description: In November-December of 2017, diphtheria outbreaks began in Yemen and in a refugee camp in Bangladesh. This, of course, happened because of the insufficient vaccination, and not because of the civil war in Yemen, and certainly not because the refugees in Bangladesh lived in tents, 30 people in each.
